translations: v．担任队长，担任船长：在团队、船只或其他组织中担任领导角色。
· He captained the team to victory.
他带领球队赢得了胜利。

phrs.translation: 库克船长（英国探险家和航海家）

sentences.sentence: He captained the winning team in 1991.
Have we been captained all this time by a codfish!
sentences.translation: 难道我们一直以来都把一条鳕鱼当做船长吗！

sentences.sentence: He captained the siege of Berlin.
sentences.translation: 他指挥了围攻柏林的战役。
